org.bradotengine.Bradot CC0-1.0 MIT Bradot Engine Multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine with a feature-rich editor ​org.bradotengine.Bradot.desktop
Bradot is an advanced, feature-packed, multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.
Bradot is completely free and open source under the very permissive MIT license. No strings attached, no royalties, nothing. Your game is yours, down to the last line of engine code.
